DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate pharmacokinetics brimonidine follow single intravitreal administration 200 ug 400 ug Brimonidine Tartrate Posterior Segment Drug Delivery System patient 2 , 4 8 week prior undergo par plana vitrectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Brimonidine Tartrate Posterior Segment Delivery System Patients Undergoing Pars Plana Vitrectomy
DOC.criteria: Plan par plana vitrectomy repair posterior segment condition ( eg , epiretinal membrane , macular hole , vitreomacular traction ) Visual acuity nonstudy eye well 20/200 History par plana vitrectomy retinal detachment surgery study eye Surgery laser treatment study eye within 3 month Use brimonidine , apraclonidine topical alpha2agonist either eye within 2 week Intraocular infection inflammation
